articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Apple says goodbye to the Clips app - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple appears to be winding down support of Clips, with the company removing Clips from the App Store and saying it will no longer be making any updates.
articles.content:
Apple appears to be winding down support of Clips, with the company removing Clips from the App Store and saying it will no longer be making any updates.

articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Trump fires back at China’s rare earth mineral restrictions by threatening 100% tariffs - TechCrunch
articles.description: President Donald Trump declared Friday that he will impose a 100% tariff on all imports from China, while also imposing export controls on “any and all critical software” from the United States.
articles.content:

articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max review: Orange you glad the battery is bigger - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple’s iPhone 17 Pro lineup adds a sturdier unibody design, bigger battery, and camera upgrades, trading thinness for power, endurance, and creator appeal.
